translation.en: [boy] Evan.

Well, hey, maybe she's into you too. Maybe you should talk to her, tell her how you feel.

Really?
Yes-- Yeah, I--
I stayed afterwards last year, after the spring jazz band concert,

Well, um…

there was ten minutes, after I fell,

Did they?

translation.en: That's not funny.
Model UN.
Well, anyways, um… How was-- Did you… How was camp?

[Zoe] Hey.

Evan…

Yeah, it is. It is. Sorry. It's Evan. It's Evan. I'm sorry.

I wish everything was different.
I wish I was different.
I wish I was part of something.
I wish that anything I said mattered to anyone.

Connor!
Come on.
-Hi. -Hi, honey, I'm so sorry.

Evan.
